sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import '../css/InputForm.css'

var today = new Date();
  var dd = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
  var mm = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); //January is 0!
  var yyyy = today.getFullYear();

  today = mm + '/' + dd + '/' + yyyy;

const InputForm = () => {
  
  return (
    <form className="input-form">
      <label htmlFor="lokasi-asal" className="input-label">Lokasi Asal</label>
      <input id="lokasi-asal" type="text" name="lokasi-asal" value="" required />
      <label htmlFor="koordinat-asal" className="input-label">Koordinat Asal</label>
      <input id="koordinat-asal" type="text" name="koordinat-asal" value="" required/>
      <label htmlFor="lokasi-tujuan" className="input-label">Lokasi Tujuan</label>
      <input id="lokasi-tujuan" type="text" name="lokasi-tujuan" value="" required/>
      <label htmlFor="koordinat-tujuan" className="input-label">Koordinat Tujuan</label>
      <input id="koordinat-tujuan" type="text" name="koordinat-tujuan" value="" required/>
      <label htmlFor="nama-kurir" className="input-label">Nama Kurir</label>
      <input id="nama-kurir" type="text" name="nama-kurir" value="" required/>
      <label htmlFor="tanggal" className="input-label">Tanggal Pengiriman</label>
      <input id="tanggal" type="date" name="tanggal" value="" required />
      <label htmlFor="estimasi-waktu" className="input-label">Estimasi Waktu Pengiriman</label>
      <input id="estimasi-waktu" type="text" name="estimasi-waktu" value="" required/>
      <button type="Submit" className="input-btn">Submit</button>
    </form>
  )
}

export default InputForm
